posts.description: i'm not having much success using "@i", "@m", "@f" or even "!" special rules or aliases on a swedish mac osx keyboard. to me it's equivalent to backspace e.g. it deletes all text. i've tried on both Coda and TextMate? - same behaviour. other than that, great work!
